english.segment1: Have you ever been so inclined. Yeah, is it on your mind. The thought we're the Lord's lone protege. Well I thought we were the only hope. Yeah, the world's safety rope. Americana has come, come to save the day. Imagine my surprise. To realize
english.segment2: [CHORUS]. Everywhere I go I can see. I'm not the only one. Moving moving to Jesus
english.segment3: I went down to Mexico. Mi amigo. And I found Jesus living outside the USA. Imagine my surprise To realize
